alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN PINELLAS AND CENTRAL HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palm River-Clair Mel, or near Tampa, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Pinellas Park, Temple Terrace, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Saint Petersburg, St. Petersburg, South Highpoint, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Egypt Lake-Leto, West And East Lealman, Macdill Air Force Base, Gandy, Feather Sound, Riverview, Safety Harbor, West Park, and Oldsmar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
